body-setup-guide:
Follow our setup guide to connect Google Search Ads 360 to Improvado.

‍Step 1. Click the Data Sources in the left navigation bar.
Categories on the Data sources page group all available platforms. Use a search to find the required one.

‍Step 2. Click on the Google Search Ads 360 tile.

Step 3. Authorize your Google account via OAuth. Before authorization, please, ensure you are signed in to the account you want to extract data from.

‍Step 4. Grant Improvado your permission to:

                       
PermissionAdditional information
View and manage your advertising data in DoubleClick SearchReport and modify your advertising data in DoubleClick Search (e.g., campaigns, ad groups, keywords, and conversions)

Step 5. After completing the connection process, the Google Search Ads 360 connection will appear in your Connected sources list.

‍Step 6. When the connection status is Active, and the account status column shows a number of accounts, you can move on to data extraction.

Step 7. To extract data from the connected sources, check the instructions on how to set up data extraction.
body:
Description

‍Google Search Ads 360 provides enhanced flexibility to build custom reports and integrate the data into your reporting applications and processes in comparison with the old Google Search Ads 360 API.
short-description: Learn how to set up ‍Google Search Ads 360 connection
name: Google Search Ads 360
seo-description: Learn how to set up ‍Google Search Ads 360 connection
body-release-notes: You can find information about the latest API changes in the official Release notes.
body-data-schema: The schema information shows all report types you can use to extract data from Google Search Ads 360.
